title.narrative: OUTP 3.2: CAPACITY TO PROVIDE Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH) SERV

description.narrative: Output 3.2 Enhanced national capacity and partnerships to provide equitable access to safe drinking water and adequate sanitation., which contributes to Environmental Sustainability, Sanitation, Wash â€“ General, Water, Water Supply. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 3: By 2020, Zimbabweans have increased and equitable use of safe drinking water, sanitation and improved hygiene practices.

title.narrative: Output 3.2 Enhanced national capacity and partnerships to provide equitable access to safe drinking water and adequate sanitation.

description.narrative: National capacity was enhanced in 2019 through the conducting of the Joint Sector Review, which resulted in a joint costed workplan for WASH which provides critical and unified direction for the sector. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

actual.value: 2019:Costing for WASH BAT and Sector Plan complete
